item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 19, 2025 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Valve releases Team Fortress 2 game code (981 points | 229 comments)
2. A year of uv: pros, cons, and should you migrate (232 points | 105 comments)
3. Alice Hamilton waged a one-woman campaign to get the lead out of everything (71 points | 17 comments)

10. The Unbrickable Pledge (6 points | discuss)

20. Tensor evolution: A framework for fast tensor computations using recurrences (39 points | 5 comments)

22. Why I'm writing a Scheme implementation in 2025: Async Rust (182 points | 70 comments)
23. Show HN: A GPU-accelerated binary vector index (42 points | 4 comments)
24. Are LLMs able to play the card game Set? (35 points | 21 comments)
25. Making my debug build run 100x faster so that it is finally usable (57 points | 13 comments)
26. Parsing JSON in 500 lines of Rust (9 points | discuss)
27. Saying goodbye to FFmpegKit (150 points | 81 comments)
28. Try thinking and learning without working memory (2008) (114 points | 58 comments)
29. Nuclear fusion: WEST beats the world record for plasma duration (240 points | 224 comments)
30. Programming with chronic pain (113 points | 56 comments)
